system.description:
When you touch a magic item, either willingly or when hit by it, you are immediately aware that it’s magical. If you hold such an item in your hand, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.dgms08g84zdlbr81]{Identify} on it as an action without spending a spell slot, even if you don’t have the spell prepared.

In addition, when you cast identify using a spell slot or as a ritual, you also learn if the item is cursed, and the Narrator will give you a hint as to the curse’s effects (which may be cryptic and vague, but must not be a lie).
